name: Spidear
description:
INTRO

You are a spider! You have two superb skills!

Skill 1 : Spitting - function for displacement, interaction and attack.

Skill 2:  Spider Sense -  you can slow down time and preview attack range.

你是一只蜘蛛！拥有超厉害的两个技能！

技能一 吐丝-可进行位移、互动和攻击；

技能二 蜘蛛感应-可放慢时间、预告攻击范围。

Player Goal

Adventure in the witch's house! 

All you want to do is get close to the TV and enjoy the latest episode of the talk show!

在女巫家冒险吧！你想做的不过是靠近电视欣赏最新一集脱口秀！

Use your ears!

I know spiders don't have ears, but pay attention to the sound!

The TV show will guide you along and warn you of the dangers.

用你的耳朵！

我知道蜘蛛没有耳朵，但是请关注声音！

电视剧将指引你前进并提醒你危险。

more information here

开发成员：

策划-郑玉月瑟、金瑜、王新凯 美术-王智跃、袁咏萱、黄敏鸣、梁思艺 程序-刘鹏、李丹丹、祝俊
